file_content.text: If Vessex Ulgo gets that evidence, soon every house on Alderaan will know who Thul hired Rist to kill and when.
They won't just banish Thul, they'll destroy them, and the Empire's chances on Alderaan will die with them.
Just give me a chance to find Ulgo and stop them from distributing the evidence.
I'll take care of it.
That may be easier said than done.
I can't say I envy your position right now.
It stinks to be you.
I'm sorry, but I have to ask for your help once more.
That's a little melodramatic, don't you think?
It's not that bad.
The Empire has been trying to establish a presence here for decades. I cannot emphasize the importance of this enough.
Vessex Ulgo commands a squad of the most highly trained commandos on Alderaan. They have even defeated Jedi.
But you--you may stand a chance! I have to ask you to recover that evidence! Quickly!
Thank you so much! Find the evidence, destroy it, and I promise you double the reward when you return.
I take the fact that you're rummaging around in the assassin's files to mean that the meeting didn't go well.
The assassin tried to take us hostage....
It was a trap.
The assassin tried to take me hostage....
It was a trap.
I expected as much. Spare no detail....
The evidence has already gone to Ulgo....
He sold us out.
You're kidding me. Dammit. Well, spare no detail....
Well, what are you waiting for? Spare no detail....
Dammit! Now we're dead in the water if we don't do something fast.
Don't worry.
I could use a fight.
This will be pathetic.
It's a long story.
